member.name: F:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvReader`1.BeforeSerialize
member.summary: After Read, before Serialize. use this to prepare row values for serialization.

member.name: P:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvReader`1.Culture
member.summary: Culture info to use for serialization.

member.name: P:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.RowData.Skip
member.summary: If true, the row will not be serialized, in this case a null element will occur in the enumerator.
